explanation: The exact phrase was 'Quand vous cherchez un bon restaurant dans cette ville, utilisez cette application mobile.' - When you're looking for a good restaurant in this city, use this mobile app. Note 'cherchez' vs 'trouvez', 'restaurant' vs 'hôtel', and 'mobile' vs 'pratique'. 'Cherchez' is the present form of 'chercher' (to look for/search), second person plural or polite form.
